items.title: Bank says inflation has 'peaked' as it holds interest rates
items.description: Rates are left unchanged after a tight vote ahead of the Budget later this month.

items.title: King officially strips Andrew of prince title
items.description: The action was previously announced, and the official record now shows it has taken place.

items.title: Wolves set to make approach for Boro boss Edwards
items.description: Wolves are set to make an approach to Championship side Middlesbrough over appointing Rob Edwards as their head coach.

items.title: Typhoon Kalmaegi hits Vietnam after killing at least 114 in Philippines
items.description: More than 260,000 soldiers are on standby for rescue efforts as winds of up to 92mph (149km/h) hit Vietnam.

items.title: Record referrals to Prevent anti-terror programme
items.description: The number of referrals to the scheme increased 27% in the year to March 2025, according to new data.
